description: Complete system overview documenting the HTSF PDF Form Processing System architecture, key components, and their interactions
Detailed documentation of laboratory submission data models including sample metadata, concentration measurements, and project relationships
Comprehensive documentation of the specialized HTSF form parsing algorithm, including extraction patterns and validation rules for laboratory data
End-to-end data flow documentation covering the submission process from PDF parsing through database storage and tracking
Detailed documentation of domain-specific validation rules for DNA/RNA samples, concentration ranges, and laboratory naming conventions
